description: The Invoice Processing Results (IPR) segment provides summary information about an adjudicated Product/Service Group or Product/Service Line Item.

1.name: IPR Identifier
1.description: Unique IPR Number assigned by the Payer Application.

2.name: Provider Cross Reference Identifier
2.description: Cross reference to Provider Product/Service Group Number or Provider Product/Service Line Item Number from original Invoice.

3.name: Payer Cross Reference Identifier
3.description: Cross reference to Payer Product/Service Group Number or Payer Product/Service Line Item Number from original Invoice.

4.name: IPR Status
4.description: Processing status for the Product/Service Group (if Adjudicate as Group = "Y") or Product/Service Line Item. Refer to User-defined Table 0571 - Invoice Processing Results Status for suggested values.

6.name: Adjudicated/Paid Amount
6.description: Adjudicated Amount for the Product/Service Group or Product/Service Line Item, which could be 0 = sum of all Payer adjustments (Adjustment Amount on ADJ).

7.name: Expected Payment Date/Time
7.description: Date payment is expected for this IPR.

8.name: IPR Checksum
8.description:
Conditional, if Status = "Accepted", then Required, else Not Permitted.

The field contains a checksum generated by the first Payer (referenced by Payer Organization in the IVC Segment) to ensure that the contents of IPR have not been altered before sending to subsequent Payers.
